Current Weather Display Panel.name: Current Weather Display Panel
Current Weather Display Panel.description: A user-facing panel displaying current weather information, including core metrics, real-time interactive radar maps with zooming, panning, time-lapse capabilities, and a legend explaining radar map colors and symbols.

stories.name: View Current Weather for Default/Current Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the current weather conditions for my automatically detected or default location so that I can quickly get relevant weather information upon opening the application.

stories.name: Display Core Weather Metrics
stories.description: As a user, I want to view essential current weather metrics such as temperature, 'feels like' temperature, humidity, and wind speed/direction so that I have a clear overview of the conditions.

stories.name: Display Weather Condition Description and Icon
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a textual description (e.g., 'Sunny', 'Partly Cloudy') and an accompanying icon for the current weather so that I can quickly understand the overall conditions.

stories.name: Indicate Data Last Updated Time
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the timestamp of when the current weather data was last updated so that I can be confident in its real-time accuracy.

stories.name: View Current Real-time Radar
stories.description: As a user, I want to view an interactive, real-time radar map displaying current precipitation and storms so that I can understand immediate weather conditions.

stories.name: Zoom Radar Map View
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to zoom in and out on the radar map so that I can view weather phenomena at different levels of detail.

stories.name: Pan Radar Map View
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to pan across the radar map so that I can explore weather conditions in different geographical areas.

stories.name: Play Time-Lapse Radar
stories.description: As a user, I want to play a time-lapse of past radar data so that I can observe the movement and evolution of weather systems.

stories.name: Understand Radar Map Legend
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a legend explaining the colors and symbols on the radar map so that I can correctly interpret the displayed weather phenomena.

Location Search and Selection Panel.name: Location Search and Selection Panel
Location Search and Selection Panel.description: A comprehensive panel for all location management interactions, including searching, selecting, auto-detecting, saving, viewing, editing, removing, prompting for location permissions, and handling location access denial by informing the user about the unavailability or limitation of location-dependent features.

stories.name: Search for a Specific Location's Weather
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for and select a specific city or location so that I can view its current weather conditions.

stories.name: Select Forecast Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for and select a specific geographic location so that I can view its hourly weather forecast.

stories.name: Search for a Specific Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for a specific city or location by name so that I can view its daily weather forecast.

stories.name: Auto-Detect Current Location
stories.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically detect my current location so that I can quickly see the daily weather forecast for where I am without manual input.

stories.name: Search for a location by name or zip code
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for a location by typing its name or zip code so that I can find the specific place I want to view weather data for.

stories.name: View search suggestions and results
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a list of matching locations with relevant details (e.g., city, state, country) as I type in the search bar so that I can quickly select the correct one.

stories.name: Select a location from search results
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a location from the search results so that its weather information becomes the primary view.

stories.name: Automatically detect current location
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to automatically detect my current geographical location so that I can view local weather without manual input.

stories.name: Add current location to saved list
stories.description: As a user, I want to add the currently viewed location to a list of my saved locations so that I can easily access its weather data again later.

stories.name: View list of saved locations
stories.description: As a user, I want to view a list of all my saved locations so that I can quickly navigate between them.

stories.name: Select a location from saved list
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a location from my saved list so that its weather data is displayed.

stories.name: Remove a location from saved list
stories.description: As a user, I want to remove a location from my saved list so that I can keep my list relevant and uncluttered.

stories.name: Add Saved Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new location to my saved list so that I can quickly access its relevant information later.

stories.name: View Saved Locations List
stories.description: As a user, I want to view a list of all my saved locations so that I can easily select one to access its relevant information.

stories.name: Edit Saved Location Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit the details of an existing saved location so that I can keep my saved locations organized and accurate.

stories.name: Remove Saved Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to remove a saved location from my list so that I can manage my list and remove locations I no longer need.

stories.name: Automatic Location Detection on Launch
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to automatically detect my current geographical location upon launch, so that I don't have to manually input it.

stories.name: Utilize Detected Location for Relevant Data
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to utilize my automatically detected location to display relevant data, so that the information presented is always specific to my current whereabouts.

stories.name: Prompt for Location Permission
stories.description: As a user, I want to be prompted for permission to access my device's location, so that I can control my privacy and data sharing.

stories.name: Handle Location Access Denial
stories.description: As a user, if I deny location access, I want the application to clearly indicate that location-dependent features will be unavailable or limited, so that I understand the consequences of my choice.

stories.name: Handle Location Detection Failure or Disabled Services
stories.description: As a user, if automatic location detection fails or my device's location services are disabled, I want the application to inform me and provide an option to manually enter a location, so that I can still access relevant data.

stories.name: Display Detected Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my current automatically detected location displayed within the application, so that I can confirm its accuracy and relevance.

stories.name: Select Location for Historical Data
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific location so that I can view its historical weather data.

Hourly Forecast Display Panel.name: Hourly Forecast Display Panel
Hourly Forecast Display Panel.description: A panel displaying detailed hourly weather forecasts, including temperature, 'feels like' temperature, precipitation details, wind speed and direction, and humidity levels.

stories.name: View Hourly Forecast Timeline
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a clear timeline of the hourly weather forecast for my selected location so that I can understand the progression of weather conditions throughout the day.

stories.name: View Hourly Temperature Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the temperature and 'feels like' temperature for each hour in the forecast so that I can understand the actual and perceived warmth or coldness.

stories.name: View Hourly Precipitation Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the chance of precipitation and expected precipitation type (e.g., rain, snow) for each hour so that I can prepare for wet weather.

stories.name: View Hourly Wind Conditions
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the wind speed and direction for each hour so that I can assess potential wind impacts on my activities.

stories.name: View Hourly Humidity Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the humidity level for each hour so that I can understand the air moisture content.

Daily Weather Summary Panel.name: Daily Weather Summary Panel
Daily Weather Summary Panel.description: A user-facing panel displaying a comprehensive summary of the daily weather forecast, including key conditions for the day.

stories.name: View Daily Weather Summary
stories.description: As a user, I want to view a comprehensive summary of the daily weather forecast for a selected location so that I can quickly understand the key conditions for the day.

Multi-Day Forecast Display Panel.name: Multi-Day Forecast Display Panel
Multi-Day Forecast Display Panel.description: A user-facing panel displaying daily weather forecasts for multiple upcoming days for a selected location.

stories.name: View Multi-Day Forecast
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the daily weather forecasts for the upcoming several days for a selected location so that I can plan my activities further in advance.

Personalization Settings Panel.name: Personalization Settings Panel
Personalization Settings Panel.description: A user-facing panel where users can manage their application settings, including notification preferences, location-specific alert opt-in settings, and preferred alert delivery methods (e.g., push, SMS, email).

stories.name: Access Personalization Settings
stories.description: As a user, I want to access a dedicated section for managing my preferences so that I can easily find and adjust my application settings.

stories.name: Set Units of Measurement
stories.description: As a user, I want to select my preferred units of measurement (e.g., Imperial, Metric) so that I can view data in a format I understand.

stories.name: Manage Notification Types
stories.description: As a user, I want to enable or disable specific types of notifications so that I only receive alerts relevant to me.

stories.name: Set Preferred Language
stories.description: As a user, I want to select my preferred language for the application so that I can use it in my native tongue.

stories.name: Persist User Preferences
stories.description: As a user, I want my chosen preferences to be saved and applied automatically so that my customized settings persist across sessions.

stories.name: Opt-in for specific locations
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to be able to opt-in to receive alerts for specific locations (e.g., home, work, family's location) so that I am informed about areas I care about.

stories.name: Choose alert delivery methods
stories.description: As an affected individual, I want to be able to choose my preferred alert delivery methods (e.g., push notification, SMS, email) so that I receive critical information in a way that works best for me.

Future Weather Map Display Panel.name: Future Weather Map Display Panel
Future Weather Map Display Panel.description: A user-facing panel displaying predicted future weather patterns, including precipitation maps, and allowing users to select different timeframes and animate forecasts.

stories.name: View Future Precipitation Map
stories.description: As a user, I want to view a visual map showing predicted future precipitation so that I can quickly understand upcoming weather patterns.

stories.name: Select Precipitation Forecast Timeframe
stories.description: As a user, I want to select different timeframes (e.g., next 1 hour, next 6 hours, next 24 hours) for the precipitation forecast so that I can plan for various short-term needs.

stories.name: Animate Precipitation Forecast
stories.description: As a user, I want to play an animation of the precipitation forecast over time so that I can observe the movement and evolution of weather systems.

stories.name: Scrub Precipitation Forecast Timeline
stories.description: As a user, I want to manually scrub through the precipitation forecast timeline so that I can examine predicted conditions at specific future moments.

stories.name: Differentiate Precipitation Types
stories.description: As a user, I want to see different types of precipitation (e.g., rain, snow, mixed) clearly distinguished on the visual forecast so that I can understand the specific nature of the upcoming weather.

stories.name: View Precipitation Intensity
stories.description: As a user, I want the visual forecast to indicate the intensity of predicted precipitation so that I can gauge how heavy the rain or snow will be.

Historical Data Parameter Selection Pane.name: Historical Data Parameter Selection Panel
Historical Data Parameter Selection Pane.description: A panel for selecting specific meteorological parameters and custom date ranges for historical weather data analysis.

stories.name: Choose Historical Weather Parameter
stories.description: As a user, I want to choose which meteorological parameter (e.g., temperature, precipitation, humidity, wind speed) to analyze so that I can focus on the data relevant to my interest.

stories.name: Specify Custom Historical Date Range
stories.description: As a user, I want to specify a custom date range for historical weather data so that I can analyze trends over a period of my choosing.

stories.name: Select Predefined Historical Date Range
stories.description: As a user, I want to select predefined time periods (e.g., last 7 days, last 30 days, last year) for historical weather data so that I can quickly view common trend analyses.

Historical Data Trend Graph Display Pane.name: Historical Data Trend Graph Display Panel
Historical Data Trend Graph Display Pane.description: A panel for displaying historical weather data visualizations, including trend graphs, bar charts, summary statistics, and comparative views of different historical data periods.

stories.name: View Historical Data Trend Graph
stories.description: As a user, I want to view historical weather data as a trend line graph so that I can easily identify patterns and changes over time.

stories.name: View Historical Precipitation Bar Chart
stories.description: As a user, I want to view historical precipitation totals as a bar chart so that I can compare accumulated values across different periods.

stories.name: Display Historical Data Summary Statistics
stories.description: As a user, I want to see summary statistics (e.g., average, minimum, maximum) for the selected historical weather parameter and period so that I can quickly understand the overall characteristics of the data.

stories.name: Compare Historical Data Periods
stories.description: As a user, I want to compare historical weather data from two different time periods for the same location so that I can identify year-over-year changes or long-term shifts.

Severe Weather Alert Creation Panel.name: Severe Weather Alert Creation Panel
Severe Weather Alert Creation Panel.description: A user-facing panel for weather authorities to create, define, specify, include actions, send, update, and cancel severe weather alerts, managing the entire lifecycle of critical notifications.

stories.name: Create new severe weather alert
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to create a new severe weather alert so that I can quickly inform the public of an impending threat.

stories.name: Define alert geographic area
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to define the specific geographic area affected by an alert so that warnings are targeted accurately.

stories.name: Include recommended actions in alert
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to include specific recommended actions within an alert so that the public knows how to respond appropriately.

stories.name: Send alert immediately
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to send an alert immediately to all relevant recipients so that critical information is disseminated without delay.

stories.name: Update active severe weather alert
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to update an active severe weather alert so that I can provide new information or changes in conditions to the public.

stories.name: Cancel active severe weather alert
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to cancel an active severe weather alert so that the public is informed when a threat has passed or is no longer valid.

Issued Alert History Display Panel.name: Issued Alert History Display Panel
Issued Alert History Display Panel.description: A panel displaying a chronological history of all previously issued severe weather alerts for review and compliance.

stories.name: View history of issued alerts
stories.description: As a weather authority, I want to be able to view a history of all issued alerts so that I can review past communications and ensure compliance.

Forecast Notification Preferences Panel.name: Forecast Notification Preferences Panel
Forecast Notification Preferences Panel.description: A user-facing panel where users can view, understand, and manage all their forecast notification settings, including enabling/disabling notifications, selecting notification locations, customizing notification content, choosing notification frequency type, specifying daily notification times, and setting periodic notification schedules.

stories.name: Enable/Disable Forecast Notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want to enable or disable forecast notifications so that I can control when I receive updates.

stories.name: Select Notification Location
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific location for my forecast notifications so that I receive relevant weather information for my area of interest.

stories.name: Customize Notification Content
stories.description: As a user, I want to customize the type of weather information (e.g., temperature, precipitation, wind) included in my forecast notifications so that I only receive the details most relevant to me.

stories.name: Specify Daily Notification Time
stories.description: As a user, I want to specify a preferred time of day for my daily forecast notifications so that I receive the update when it's most convenient for me.

stories.name: Set Periodic Notification Schedule
stories.description: As a user, I want to select specific days of the week and times for my periodic forecast notifications so that I receive updates only when and where I need them.

stories.name: View Current Notification Settings
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my current forecast notification settings so that I can easily understand and manage my preferences.

Weather Advisory Creation Panel.name: Weather Advisory Creation Panel
Weather Advisory Creation Panel.description: A user-facing panel for weather alert administrators to create and manage non-severe weather advisories.

stories.name: Create Weather Advisory
stories.description: As a weather alert administrator, I want to create a new weather advisory with specific details so that I can inform users about non-severe but relevant conditions.

Alert Geographic Area Definition Panel.name: Alert Geographic Area Definition Panel
Alert Geographic Area Definition Panel.description: A UI component for administrators to define and select the geographic area for a weather alert.

stories.name: Define Alert Geographic Area
stories.description: As a weather alert administrator, I want to specify the geographic area for a weather alert so that only users in the affected region receive it.

Alert Validity Period Setting Panel.name: Alert Validity Period Setting Panel
Alert Validity Period Setting Panel.description: A panel for administrators to set the start and end times for weather alerts, defining their active period.

stories.name: Set Alert Validity Period
stories.description: As a weather alert administrator, I want to set the start and end times for a weather alert so that alerts are active only when necessary.

Active Alert Management Panel.name: Active Alert Management Panel
Active Alert Management Panel.description: A panel for administrators to modify or cancel active weather alerts.

stories.name: Modify or Cancel Active Alert
stories.description: As a weather alert administrator, I want to modify or cancel an active weather alert so that I can correct information or remove outdated alerts.

Weather Alert Details Display Panel.name: Weather Alert Details Display Panel
Weather Alert Details Display Panel.description: A user-facing panel to display the full details of a received weather alert, including specific conditions and recommended actions.

stories.name: View Weather Alert Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the full details of a received weather alert so that I can understand the specific conditions and recommended actions.

Alert Preferences Management Panel.name: Alert Preferences Management Panel
Alert Preferences Management Panel.description: A user-facing panel where users can manage their weather alert preferences, including location and type of alerts received.

stories.name: Manage Alert Preferences
stories.description: As a user, I want to manage my weather alert preferences (e.g., location, type) so that I only receive alerts that are most relevant to me.

stories.name: View Notification Preferences
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my current notification preferences so that I can understand how I will receive alerts.

stories.name: Manage Alert Type Subscriptions
stories.description: As a user, I want to enable or disable specific types of weather alerts (e.g., severe weather, daily forecast) so that I only receive notifications relevant to my needs.

stories.name: Select Notification Delivery Methods
stories.description: As a user, I want to choose my preferred delivery method(s) (e.g., email, SMS, push notification) for each type of alert so that I receive notifications via my most convenient channels.

stories.name: Configure Notification Frequency
stories.description: As a user, I want to set the frequency (e.g., immediate, daily, weekly) for each type of weather alert so that I receive information at an appropriate interval.

stories.name: Save Notification Preference Changes
stories.description: As a user, I want to save my updated notification preferences so that my changes are applied and remembered.

stories.name: Enable/Disable push notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to enable or disable push notifications for weather alerts so that I can control my immediate alert preferences.

stories.name: Specify email address for alerts
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to specify the email address where I receive weather alerts so that notifications are sent to my preferred inbox.

stories.name: Enable/Disable email notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to enable or disable email notifications for weather alerts so that I can control whether I receive alerts via email.

stories.name: Specify phone number for SMS alerts
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to specify the phone number where I receive SMS weather alerts so that notifications are sent to my preferred mobile device.

stories.name: Enable/Disable SMS notifications
stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to enable or disable SMS notifications for weather alerts so that I can control whether I receive alerts via text message.

Temporary Email Alert Display.name: Temporary Email Alert Display
Temporary Email Alert Display.description: A temporary UI component for displaying received email alerts, to be moved to the correct container.

Core UI Element Design and Clarity.name: Core UI Element Design and Clarity
Core UI Element Design and Clarity.description: This box is for stories focused on ensuring interactive UI elements are intuitive and clear, including immediate action feedback, helpful error messages, legible content presentation, engaging icons and imagery, smooth transitions and animations, refined and polished design of interactive elements (e.g., buttons, forms, input fields), and high-quality graphics and visual assets.

stories.name: Clear UI Element Purpose
stories.description: As a user, I want the purpose of all interactive elements (e.g., buttons, links, input fields) to be immediately clear so that I can confidently use the application without confusion.

stories.name: Immediate Action Feedback
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive clear and timely feedback on my actions (e.g., success messages, error alerts, loading indicators) so that I always understand the status of my operations.

stories.name: Helpful Error Messages
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive clear, actionable, and user-friendly error messages when something goes wrong so that I can understand the problem and easily resolve it.

stories.name: Legible Content Presentation
stories.description: As a user, I want all text and visual information to be presented in a clear, readable, and well-organized manner so that I can quickly comprehend the content without effort.

stories.name: Engaging Icons and Imagery
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to use engaging and relevant icons and imagery so that the interface is more intuitive and visually interesting.

stories.name: Smooth UI Transitions and Animations
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to incorporate subtle and smooth transitions and animations so that interactions feel fluid and dynamic.

stories.name: High-Quality Visual Assets
stories.description: As a user, I want the application to use high-quality graphics and visual assets so that the overall appearance is crisp and professional.
